text: The Difficult Way is a 1914 British silent drama film directed by George Loane Tucker and starring Jane Gail, Gerald Ames and Langhorn Burton.McFarlane & Slide p.1809 ==Cast== * Jane Gail as Nan * Gerald Ames as Roger Wentworth * Langhorn Burton as Rev. John Pilgrim ==References== ==Bibliography== * Brian McFarlane & Anthony Slide. The Encyclopedia of British Film: Fourth Edition. Oxford University Press, 2013. ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:1914 drama films Category:English-language films Category:British films Category:British silent feature films Category:British drama films Category:Films directed by George Loane Tucker Category:British black-and- white films
title: The Difficult Way
